channel.title: law of attraction on Barefoot Rob
channel.description: Recent content in law of attraction on Barefoot Rob

item.title: The Law of Attraction is real
item.description: draft: true The Law of Attraction is real, but maybe not in the way you’ve heard portrayed. “Think of something and it comes to you” brings to mind people thinking of a new fancy car, but still not see it in their driveway so assume LoA is a LoAd of Hooey. But let’s go to a more subtle level. In the same way that my focus matters, I tend to bring experiences to myself based on my intention or attention.
